short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organise your work in browser - share important links with your team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
👋 QUICK INTRO 

Quickmark lets you create a collection of important links and share it with your team. Which means, you never have to go around asking for that important link you need urgently..

You can also manage your tabs, history and bookmarks to better organize your browsing experience.

All this to get you peace of mind and a lot of free time at your hand.. :) 


👍🏻 TESTIMONIALS 

“Quickmark saves at least one hour everyday for me. It is the only chrome extension I need to manage all my work in Chrome and multiple hats I wear throughout the day. I can’t imagine a day without using Quickmark”  - Alex 


🌟 TOP FEATURES

Create & share Collections (LIVE)
- Save open tabs
- AI based suggestions
- Cloud sync
- Invite team members by email ID

Quick Access
Organize your open tabs, history, bookmarks

Favorites
Create collection of favourite links from your open tabs, history 

Quick Create
Create meeting links, docs, spreadsheet in just one click 

Quick Search
Search in Gmail, Drive, Youtube, Google


🫱‍🫲 SUPPORT 
We offer 24x7 support across all plans. Send an email to hi@getquickmark.com with “Support” in the subject line for quick response.
